paper_abstract: We present a construction of demi-matroids, a generalization of matroids, from linear codes over finite Frobenius rings, as well as a Greene-type identity for rank generating functions of demi-matroids. We also prove a MacWilliams-type identity for Hamming support enumerators of linear codes over finite Frobenius rings. As a special case, these results give a combinatorial proof of the MacWilliams identity for Hamming weight enumerators of linear codes over finite Frobenius rings.
paper_title: Demi-matroids from codes over finite Frobenius rings
